Interface Hex

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleHex, Triple

    public interface Hex
    A triple of Rhombs, any two of which have a common edge. This triple can be flipped, which shifts the three Rhombs to opposite sides of the hex.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(Rhomb jj)
      Determine if this contains a given Rhomb.
      SimpleHex createSimpleHex(java.util.List<Rhomb> allJoins, java.util.List<Rhomb> newJoins)
      Create a simplified version of this.
      java.util.List<Hex> flip()
      Flip the Rhombs in this Hex.
      SimplePolygon2D getHex()
      Getter method.
      Rhomb[] getJoins()
      Getter method.
      boolean valid()
      Determine if this represents a hexagon--i.e., if the three Rhombs are still in contact.

    • Method Detail

      • getJoins

        Rhomb[] getJoins()
        Getter method.
        Returns:
        A list of the three Rhombs.

      • getHex

        SimplePolygon2D getHex()
        Getter method.
        Returns:
        A polygon equal to the union of the three rhombs.

      • createSimpleHex

        SimpleHex createSimpleHex(java.util.List<Rhomb> allJoins,
                        java.util.List<Rhomb> newJoins)
        Create a simplified version of this.
        Returns:
        A SimpleHex with all the essential information of this.

      • valid

        boolean valid()
        Determine if this represents a hexagon--i.e., if the three Rhombs are still in contact.
        Returns:
        true if the three Rhombs are still in contact.

      • contains

        boolean contains(Rhomb jj)
        Determine if this contains a given Rhomb.
        Parameters:
        jj - The Rhomb we're looking for.
        Returns:
        true if this contains jj, false otherwise.

      • flip

        java.util.List<Hex> flip()
        Flip the Rhombs in this Hex. This shifts them to opposite sides of the hex.
        Returns:
        A list of all Hexes created or destroyed by this flip.
